Game.win_up_to_des1:
Your location is saved
at the end of each game.
Let the road trip begin!
Game.win_up_to_des2:
Some locations will unlock
 extra in-game features!
Game.tutorial_00:
Match any WINNING NUMBER to any YOUR NUMBER and win a prize.
Find a multiplier symbol and the prize is multiplied!0
Game.tutorial_01:
Fill the fuel meter and proceed to the next level on the map.
Your location is saved at the end of each game.0
Game.tutorial_02:
Reveal a Fuel symbol coin to add extra fuel to the meter.
The amount of fuel is increased based on the ticket cost.0
Game.tutorial_03: Unlock extra YOUR NUMBER wedges to turn NO WIN wedges into PRIZE wedges on the WHEEL OF FORTUNE® Bonus Wheel.0
Game.tutorial_04: Play the WHEEL OF FORTUNE® Bonus Round at the end of each game for a chance to win an additional bonus prize.0
Game.unlocksegment_12: Unlocks additional blue YOUR NUMBER when you reach level 5 on the map0
Game.unlocksegment_13: Unlocks additional green YOUR NUMBER when you reach level 11 on the map0
Game.unlocksegment_14: Unlocks additional pink YOUR NUMBER when you reach level 19 on the map0
Game.unlocksegment_15: Unlocks additional purple YOUR NUMBER when you reach level 29 on the map0
